sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE , P2MGR.SF_PRT_AT_NM(E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE) APP_PRT_AT_KOR_NM , E.APP_AGENT_CODE , E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE , DECODE(P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM(DECODE(#sAgentGubun#,'1', E.APP_AGENT_CODE, E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE)), '-1','','-2','','-3','', P2MGR.SF_AGENT_NM(DECODE(#sAgentGubun#,'1', E.APP_AGENT_CODE, E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE))) AGENT_NM , E.CALL_LETTER , P2MGR.SF_VSSL_CALL_LETTER(E.CALL_LETTER) VSSL_NM , E.FEE_TP , DECODE(P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM(E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, E.FEE_TP),'-1','','-2','','-3','', P2MGR.SF_FEE_TP_NM(E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, E.FEE_TP)) FEE_TP_NM , E.YR || '-' || E.SER_NO YR , TO_CHAR(E.IO_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IO_DT , DECODE(P2MGR.SF_FACIL_NM(E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, E.FAC_CODE, E.FAC_SUB_CODE),'-1','','-2','','-3','', P2MGR.SF_FACIL_NM(E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE, E.FAC_CODE, E.FAC_SUB_CODE)) FACIL_NM , DECODE(E.FEE_TP, 'L0', DECODE(E.IN_OUT, '1', '외항입항', '2', '외항출항', '3', '내항입항', '4','내항출항',''), DECODE(E.IN_OUT, '1', '외항', '2', '내항', '') ) IN_OUT , E.FISCAL_YR , E.BILL_NO , TO_CHAR(NVL(E.STANDARD_FEE, 0), '999,999,999,999') AS STANDARD_FEE , E.REAL_TN , TO_CHAR(E.BILL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BILL_DT , NVL(E.DC_RATE_NM, '0') || '%' DC_RATE_NM , TO_CHAR(NVL(E.EXMP_AMNT, 0), '999,999,999,999') AS EXMP_AMNT FROM SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR E WHERE 1 = 1
AND E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = #sAppPrtAtCode#
AND E.FEE_TP IN ('R0', 'R1', 'R2', 'R3')
AND E.FEE_TP = #sFeeTp#
AND E.APP_AGENT_CODE = #sAgentCode#
AND E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE = #sAgentCode#
AND E.CMPL_YR LIKE #sCmplYr# || '%'
AND E.CONST_NO LIKE #sConstNo# || '%'
AND E.UPDT_DATE >= TO_DATE(#sSearchDtFr#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND E.UPDT_DATE < TO_DATE(#sSearchDtTo#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
AND E.BILL_DT >= TO_DATE(#sSearchDtFr#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND E.BILL_DT < TO_DATE(#sSearchDtTo#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
ORDER BY E.PRT_AT_CODE, AGENT_NM, E.CMPL_YR, E.CONST_NO, E.IO_DT ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT , COUNT(*) TOT_CNT , TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(E.EXMP_AMNT),0), '999,999,999,999') SUM_EXMP_AMNT FROM SOC_EXMP_F@YGPA_P2MGR E WHERE 1 = 1
AND E.APP_PRT_AT_CODE = #sAppPrtAtCode#
AND E.FEE_TP IN ('R0', 'R1', 'R2', 'R3')
AND E.FEE_TP = #sFeeTp#
AND E.APP_AGENT_CODE = #sAgentCode#
AND E.EXMP_AGENT_CODE = #sAgentCode#
AND E.CMPL_YR LIKE #sCmplYr# || '%'
AND E.CONST_NO LIKE #sConstNo# || '%'
AND E.UPDT_DATE >= TO_DATE(#sSearchDtFr#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND E.UPDT_DATE < TO_DATE(#sSearchDtTo#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
AND E.BILL_DT >= TO_DATE(#sSearchDtFr#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND E.BILL_DT < TO_DATE(#sSearchDtTo#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
